entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:51 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
